1.Write a program to find the largest of two numbers.? @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class LargestNumber { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter a and b"); Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in); int a=s.nextInt(); int b=s.nextInt(); largestNumber(a,b); } public static int largestNumber(int num1,int num2){ if(num1>num2) { System.out.println("a is large number"); return num1; } else{ System.out.println("b is large number"); return num2; } } } @CODE_END@

Enter a and b values
1
4
b is large number

2.Write a program swap two numbers.? @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class SwapWithTemp { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner sc=new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter a and b values"); int a = sc.nextInt(); int b = sc.nextInt(); int temp; System.out.println("before swapping a and b values are..."+a +", "+b); temp=a; a=b; b=temp; System.out.println("after swapping a and b values are..."+a +", "+b); } } @CODE_END@

Enter a and b values
2
4
before swapping a and b values are...2, 4
after swapping a and b values are...4, 2

 3.Write a program swap two numbers without using a temporary variable. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class SwapWithoutTemp { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter a and b values "); int a = sc.nextInt(); int b = sc.nextInt(); System.out.println("Before swapping a and b values are "+a +", "+b); int A=0,B=0; swapWithoutTemp(a,b); } public static void swapWithoutTemp(int a, int b) { int A=a+b; int B=A-b; A=A-B; System.out.println("After swapping a and b values are "+A +", "+B); } } @CODE_END@

Enter a and b values
10
30
Before swapping a and b values are 10, 30
After swapping a and b values are 30, 10

4.Write a program to add, subtract and multiplication of two numbers. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class ArithmeticOperation { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter a and b values"); int a =sc.nextInt(); int b =sc.nextInt(); add(a , b); difference(a , b); product(a , b); division(a , b); } //-----Addition----- static int add(int num1,int num2) { int sum=num1+num2; System.out.println("Sum of two numbers is:" +sum); return sum; } //-----Subtraction----- static int difference(int num1,int num2) { int difference=num1-num2; System.out.println("Difference of two numbers is:" +difference); return difference; } //-----Multiplication----- static int product(int num1,int num2) { int product=num1 * num2; System.out.println("Product of two numbers is:" +product); return product; } //-----Division----- static int division(int num1,int num2) { int division=num1 / num2; System.out.println("Division of two numbers is:" +division); return division; } } @CODE_END@

Enter a and b values
10
20
Sum of two numbers is:30
Difference of two numbers is:-10
Product of two numbers is:200
Division of two numbers is:0

5.Write a program to find the greatest of three numbers. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class GreatestNumber { public static void main(String[] args) { int a, b, c, largest; Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter any three numbers: "); a = s.nextInt(); b = s.nextInt(); c = s.nextInt(); if (a >= b && a >= c) { System.out.println("Largest number: " + a); } if (b >= a && b >= c) { System.out.println("Largest number: " + b); } if (c >= a && c >= b) { System.out.println("Largest number: " + c); } } } @CODE_END@

Enter any three numbers:
1
5
7
Largest number: 7

 6.Write a program to print the digit at ones place of a number.? @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class OnesPlaceDigit { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter number"); Scanner s=new Scanner(System.in); int number=s.nextInt(); unitsPlaceDigit(number); } public static int unitsPlaceDigit(int num) { int remainder =num%10; System.out.println("ones place digit is: " +remainder); return remainder; } } @CODE_END@

Enter number
231
ones place digit is: 1

7.Write a program to enter a number and then calculate the sum of its digits. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class SumOfDigits { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter the number"); Scanner number =new Scanner(System.in); int num=number.nextInt(); SumOfDigits(num); } public static void SumOfDigits(int num1){ int sum=0; while(num1!=0) { int remainder=num1%10; sum =sum+remainder; num1=num1/10; } System.out.println("sum of digits of a number:" +sum ); } } @CODE_END@

Enter the number
245
sum of digits of a number:11

 8.Write a program to print reverse of a given number @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class ReverseNumber { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int number, reversenum = 0; System.out.println("Enter the number to reverse"); Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); number = in.nextInt(); reverseNumber(number); } public static void reverseNumber(int num){ int reversenum=0; while( num != 0 ) { reversenum = reversenum * 10; reversenum = reversenum + num%10; num = num/10; } System.out.println("Reverse of entered number is " +reversenum); } } @CODE_END@

Enter the number to reverse
279
Reverse of entered number is 972

 9.Write a program to determine whether a person is eligible to vote. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class CheckVoteEligibility { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int age=0; System.out.println("Enter age of a person:"); Scanner scanner=new Scanner(System.in); age=scanner.nextInt(); checkVoteEligibility(age); } public static void checkVoteEligibility(int age){ if(age>=18) { System.out.println("person is eligible for vote"); } else { System.out.println("person is not eligible for vote"); } } } @CODE_END@

Enter age of a person:
40
person is eligible for vote

10.Write a program to find whether a given year is leap year or not. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class CheckLeapYear { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int year=0; System.out.println("Enter year:"); Scanner scanner=new Scanner(System.in); year=scanner.nextInt(); checkLeapOrNot(year); } public static void checkLeapOrNot(int year){ if(year%4==0) { System.out.println("It is leap year"); } else { System.out.println("It is not leap year"); } } } @CODE_END@

Enter year:
2019
It is not leap year

 11.Write a program to find given number is Palindrum or not. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class Palindrome{ public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter a number to check palindrome or not:"); Scanner scanner=new Scanner(System.in); int number =scanner.nextInt(); palindrome(number); } public static int palindrome(int n) { int temp=n; int remainder=0; int reverse=0; while(n>0) { remainder=n%10; reverse=reverse*10+remainder;//res=res+rev; answer is sum of 124 is 7 n=n/10; } if (temp==reverse) { System.out.println("It is palindrome number"); } else { System.out.println("Not a palindrome"); } return reverse; } } @CODE_END@

Enter a number to check palindrome or not:
151
It is palindrome number

12.Write a program to find prime numbers between 1 to n. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class PrimesBetween1toN { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter the value of n:"); int n = scanner.nextInt(); primesBetweenGivenNum(n); } static String primesBetweenGivenNum(int number) { String primeNumbers = ""; for (int i = 1; i <= number; i++) { int counter=0; for(int num =i; num>=1; num--) { if(i%num==0) { counter = counter + 1; } } if (counter ==2) { primeNumbers = primeNumbers + i + " "; } } System.out.println("Prime numbers from 1 to n are :"); System.out.println(primeNumbers); return primeNumbers; } } @CODE_END@

Enter the value of n:
6
Prime numbers from 1 to n are :
2 3 5

13.Write a program to Calculate factorial of a given number. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class Factorial { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter number to find factorial:"); Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in); int n=scanner.nextInt(); factorial(n); } public static int factorial(int num){ int factorial=1; for (int i=1;i<=num;i++) { factorial=factorial*i; } System.out.println("Factorial of given number is:" +factorial); return factorial; } } @CODE_END@

Enter number to find factorial:
5
Factorial of given number is:120

14.Write a program to calculate sum of squares of first n numbers. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class SumOfSquars { public static void main(String[] args) { Scanner sc = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.print("Enter Integer: "); int n = sc.nextInt(); System.out.println("You entered: " + n); int sum = 1; for (int x = 2; x <= n; x++) { sum = sum + (x * x); } System.out.println(sum); } } @CODE_END@

Enter Integer: 3
You entered: 3
14

15.Write a program to find whether the given number is an Armstrong or not. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class ArmstrongNumber { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println("Enter number to check armstrong or not:"); Scanner scanner=new Scanner(System.in); int number =scanner.nextInt(); armstrong(number); } private static int armstrong(int n) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub int sum=0,temp=n; while(n!=0) { int remainder=n%10; sum=sum+remainder*remainder*remainder; n=n/10; } if(temp==sum) { System.out.println("It is armstrong number" ); } else { System.out.println("Not an armstrong number" ); } return n; } } @CODE_END@

Enter number to check armstrong or not:
153
It is armstrong number

16.Write a program to find GCD of two numbers.? @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class GCDNumber { public static void main(String[] args) { // TODO Auto-generated method stub System.out.println(findGCD(8, 24)); } public static int findGCD(int a,int b){ if(b==0) { return a; } return findGCD(b, a%b); } } @CODE_END@

value is :8

 17.Write a program to print Fibonacci series without using recursion @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class FibonacciSeries{ public static void main(String args[]) { int terms, last = 1, secondLast = 0, current, i; Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter number of terms in Fibonacci Series"); terms = in.nextInt(); /* * Nth term = (N-1)th thrm + (N-2)th term; */ for (i = 0; i < terms; i++) { if (i < 2) { current = i; } else { current = last + secondLast; secondLast = last; last = current; } System.out.print(current + " "); } } } @CODE_END@

Enter number of terms in Fibonacci Series
6
0 1 1 2 3 5

18.Write a program to print Fibonacci series using recursion. @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class FibonacciWithRecursion{ public static void main(String args[]) { int terms, i; Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter number of terms in Fibonacci Series"); terms = in.nextInt(); /* * fibonacci(N) = fibonacci(N-1) + fibonacci(N-2); */ for (i = 0; i < terms; i++) { System.out.print(fibonacci(i) + " "); } } public static int fibonacci(int num) { /* Exit condition of recursion */ if (num < 2) return num; return fibonacci(num - 1) + fibonacci(num - 2); } } @CODE_END@

Enter number of terms in Fibonacci Series
6
0 1 1 2 3 5

19.Write programs for this patterns@CODE_START@@JAVA@1 22 333 4444 55555@CODE_END@ @CODE_START@@JAVA@package pioneercoders; public class Pattern1 { public static void main(String[] args) { Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in); int n; System.out.println("enter n value"); n=in.nextInt(); for(int i=1;i<=n;i++) { for(int j=1;j<=i;j++) { System.out.print(+i); } System.out.println( ); } } } @CODE_END@

enter n value
5
1
22
333
4444
55555
